column4: I've S'ed TFW...but still I'm not able to get my new Logitec webcam functioning. Anyone who can point me in a direction?
Have you looked at the ubuntu supported hardware page to see if it is listed?
This looks promising if you have not already seen it   http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=53755&highlight=Logitech+QuickCam
